text:
Hi <@UDDMNMB7H>
To my knowledge, email prompt for setting password will only work for live domains i.e production instance and it will not be triggered for sandboxes.

To send the email with required domain you can go to "Domains & URLs" section under the same menu of Website. Here you can set the primary and secondary domains and emails for the system. So, you can make the required domain as primary and others as secondary.
Hopefully that will resolve your issue.
Hi <@U02MK065QB1>  Thank you for the solution. I was thinking the same.. Let me try this solution.
